VIM

Source: vignettes/VIM.Rmd
VIM.Rmd

VIM introduces tools for visualization of missing values. Forthermore, methods to impute missing values and visualizing imputed values are featured.

Visualize missing values

library(VIM)
data(sleep)
x <- sleep[, c("Dream", "Sleep")]
head(x)
#>   Dream Sleep
#> 1    NA   3.3
#> 2   2.0   8.3
#> 3    NA  12.5
#> 4    NA  16.5
#> 5   1.8   3.9
#> 6   0.7   9.8
marginplot(x)

Impute missing values

x_imputed <- kNN(x)

Visualize imputed values

marginplot(x_imputed, delimiter = "_imp")

Developed by Matthias Templ, Alexander Kowarik, Andreas Alfons.
